function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 pandemic introducing unprecedented changes in residential building energy consumption.","Impact":"Inaccurate building energy modeling and inefficient energy use if not addressed.","Mitigation":"Update building energy modeling methods based on new consumption patterns and occupant behavior.","Technologies":"Advanced data analysis techniques, occupancy sensors, energy modeling software.","People":"Occupants of residential buildings, energy analysts, building energy modelers.","Owner":"Energy analysts, building energy modelers."},{"Description":"Increased energy consumption due to changes in occupant behavior and usage of residential buildings during the pandemic.","Impact":"Higher energy bills, increased environmental impact, and strain on energy infrastructure.","Mitigation":"Encourage energy-efficient practices, educate occupants on responsible energy use, and implement energy-saving technologies.","Technologies":"Smart thermostats, energy-efficient appliances, occupancy sensors, home energy management systems.","People":"Occupants of residential buildings, energy efficiency advocates, policymakers.","Owner":"Energy efficiency advocates, policymakers, building managers."},{"Description":"Reliance on historical data and assumptions for building energy modeling may not accurately reflect current energy consumption patterns.","Impact":"Inaccurate energy projections, inefficient building design, and equipment sizing.","Mitigation":"Incorporate real-time data and occupant behavior analysis into energy modeling, update design standards based on current consumption patterns.","Technologies":"Real-time energy monitoring systems, building energy simulation software, IoT devices.","People":"Building energy modelers, architects, construction engineers.","Owner":"Architects, construction engineers, building energy analysts."}]}
